uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.experimedia.arch.ecc.configRegistry.api

Interface IECCProjectConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ECCConfigAPIImpl

    public interface IECCProjectConfig
    Interface to the API methods concerned with existing project configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigData

        String getConfigData(String component,
                   String feature)
                     throws Exception
        Use this method to get the configuration info for named EXPERIMEDIA component feature. For example, to get the ECC's RabbitMQ feature config data, request "ECC" and "RabbitMQ". If the configuration data exists on the repository, it will be returned as a JSON array of configuration properties.
        Parameters:
        component - - Name of the EXPERIMEDIA component required
        feature - - Name of the component feature required.
        Returns:
        - The configuration data of the feature as a string or if empty "no_config"
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when component and/or feature name is NULL or does not exist in repository.

      • getDefaultConfigData

        String getDefaultConfigData(String component,
                          String feature)
                            throws Exception
        Use this method to get the default configuration file for a named EXPERIMEDIA component feature. For example, to get the ECC's RabbitMQ feature config data, request "ECC" and "RabbitMQ". If the configuration data exists on the repository, it will be returned as a JSON array of configuration properties.
        Parameters:
        component - - Name of the EXPERIMEDIA component required
        feature - - Name of the component feature required.
        Returns:
        - The configuration data of the feature as a string or if empty "no_config"
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when component and/or feature name is NULL.

      • componentFeatureConfigExists

        boolean componentFeatureConfigExists(String component,
                                   String feature)
                                     throws Exception
        Use this method to find whether a configuration file exists for a specified component feature.
        Parameters:
        component - - Name of the EXPERIMEDIA component required
        feature - - Name of the component feature required.
        Returns:
        - True or false
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when component and/or feature name is NULL.

      • createLocalComponentFeature

        void createLocalComponentFeature(String component,
                               String feature)
                                 throws Exception
        Method used to create locally stored directories for a component and feature in the specified local repository.
        Parameters:
        component - - The named component.
        feature - - The named feature.
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws if the component or feature is invalid.

      • putLocalComponentFeature

        void putLocalComponentFeature(String component,
                            String feature,
                            String data)
                              throws Exception
        Method to put a configuration file into the specified locally store component feature directory. Will create directories if they do not already exist. Will replace the file it already exists.
        Parameters:
        component - - The named component.
        feature - - The named feature.
        data - - The JSON string to be saved in the file.
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws if the component feature, or data is invalid.

      • putComponentFeatureConfig

        void putComponentFeatureConfig(String component,
                             String feature,
                             String jsonConfig)
                               throws Exception
        Use this method to write configuration data for ECC specific feature.
        Parameters:
        component - - Name of the EXPERIMEDIA component
        feature - - Name of the component feature
        jsonConfig - - A JSON string containing the configuration data
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when component and/or feature name is NULL.

      • putDefaultComponentFeature

        void putDefaultComponentFeature(String component,
                              String feature,
                              String jsonConfig)
                                throws Exception
        Use this method to write configuration data for ECC specific feature in the default configuration directory.
        Parameters:
        component - - Name of the EXPERIMEDIA component
        feature - - Name of the component feature
        jsonConfig - - A JSON string containing the configuration data
        Throws:
        Exception - -Throws when component and/or feature name is NULL.

      • deleteComponentFeatureConfig

        void deleteComponentFeatureConfig(String component,
                                String feature)
                                  throws Exception
        Use this method to delete a configuration file from a specified component feature
        Parameters:
        component - - Name of the EXPERIMEDIA component
        feature - - Name of the component feature
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when component or feature is invalid.

      • getLocalConfigFile

        String getLocalConfigFile(String filePath)
                          throws Exception
        Use this method to retrieve a file stored on the local computer and convert that file to a string
        Parameters:
        filePath - - The drive, directory path, filename and extension of the file
        Returns:
        - The configuration data file as a string or if empty "no_config".
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when file does not exist.

      • getLocalCompenentFeature

        String getLocalCompenentFeature(String component,
                              String feature)
                                throws Exception
        Use this method to retrieve file store in a local repository and convert that file to a string. The method assumes that the local repository, components and features have been created.
        Parameters:
        component - - The component name.
        feature - - The feature name.
        Returns:
        - The configuration file as a JSON string.
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when file does not exist.

      • getProjectUrl

        String getProjectUrl()
                     throws Exception
        Method used to return the project URL.
        Returns:
        - The project URL
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws if project URl does not exist.

      • projectExists

        boolean projectExists(String projectUrl)
                      throws Exception
        Method to check that a project exists in the repository. The parameter projectUrl must include the entire URL including the repository, for instance: "http://project.org/repository/projectname".
        Parameters:
        projectUrl - - The entire URL of the project
        Returns:
        - True or false
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws when the project URL is NULL.

      • createComponentFeature

        void createComponentFeature(String component,
                          String feature)
                            throws Exception
        Method to create both directories for a component and a feature if they do not exist.
        Parameters:
        component - - The component name.
        feature - - The feature name.
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws if the component or the feature is invalid.

      • createDefaultComponentFeature

        void createDefaultComponentFeature(String component,
                                 String feature)
                                   throws Exception
        Method to create both directories for a component and a feature if they do not exist.
        Parameters:
        component - - The component name.
        feature - - The feature name.
        Throws:
        Exception - - Throws if the component or the feature is invalid.
